summary:
I like writing Javascript without a build system
and for the millionth time yesterday I ran into a problem where I needed to
figure out how to import a Javascript library in my code without using a build
system, and it took FOREVER to figure out how to import it because the
library‚Äôs setup instructions assume that you‚Äôre using a build system. 
Luckily at this point I‚Äôve mostly learned how to navigate this situation and
either successfully use the library or decide it‚Äôs too difficult and switch to
a different library, so here‚Äôs the guide I wish I had to importing Javascript
libraries years ago. 
I‚Äôm only going to talk about using Javacript libraries on the frontend, and
only about how to use them in a no-build-system setup...
title: Importing a frontend Javascript library without a build system
